entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
